QuestData.Title: Familiar Intruders
QuestData.Description: Fleshling. Some of your kind skitter among the rocks. Too cowardly to approach, too swift to be crushed.$B$BIf you wish my favor, deal with them. I tire of these games.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the "fleshling" intruders in the Crimson Expanse.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to see you again, $g brother:sister;. I see that your efforts go well. The Stone Lords appear to be showing you some degree of trust.$B$BWe've come to help. We might be of some aid in tracking down the source of this sudden growth. I highly suspect your giant friend's aggressions are focused in the wrong direction.
